name: Bicycle Dog Leash for Riding, Hands Free 150° Rotating Built-in Shock Absorber Bike Retractable Leashes for Cycling, Elastic Nylon Adjusted Car Holder Seat Belt Rope (Silver)
short_description: ✔ High Packaging list:& Durability: The main body of the dog bicycle leash is made of metal, which is an aluminum alloy shell, built-in metal spring and stainless steel rod, which is rust-proof and durable, withstands a pulling force of more than 1,000 pounds, and can meet the needs of large, medium and small dogs.

✔ Security & Freedom : Hands free bike dog leash allows cyclists to secure their hands on the handlebars when riding with their dogs, ensuring the safety of the cyclist. The bicycle connector can be rotated freely to 150°, allowing the dog to have enough space to move on both sides, while limiting the dog to run only on both sides close to the bicycle, taking into account both freedom and safety.

✔ Built-in powerful safety springs: Integrated shock absorbing springs reduce sudden pulls, help control your dog's running speed, and prevent dangerous jerks from causing riders to lose balance and fall, ensuring the safety of the rider and your dog.

✔ 150° rotation: Bicycle dog leash that supports 180 degrees rotation, When the bicycle bracket rotates to 180 degrees or 0 degrees, it may touch the cyclist's heel, which will affect the riding. We use the 150 degree rotation solution to solve the ignorance of the riding factor while ensuring the dog's free running.

✔ The matching elasticity can adjust the nylon car dog leash: The matching dog leash is made of high-quality nylon material and zinc alloy dog ​​buckle. It is stretch-resistant and durable. The length can be adjusted according to needs, and the elasticity can slow down the dog's sudden rush. The leash can also be used independently as a car seat belt to easily mount pet seat belts on most sedans, trucks, or SUVs.
✔ Fits most bikes: Universal design works with most standard bicycles. The tools and silicone gaskets are included to ensure that they can be installed on the bicycle easily, quickly and stably.

name: Non-stop dogwear Bungee Leash Elastic Dog Leash for Sports Like Running, Biking and Skiing with Dogs, Black/Orange, Size 2.8 m / 23 mm
short_description: Fully elastic – The entire length of the Bungee leash is elastic for ideal shock absorption. This ensures a smooth experience for both your dog and yourself when running, biking, or skiing.
Solid – This elastic line is made with a high-quality rubber core, strong enough to hold even the most powerful dogs. The core is protected by a durable polyester layer.

Trusted by professionals – This line is the preferred choice of some of the World’s best athletes in canicross, bikejoring and skijoring. The Bungee leash is an excellent choice for any active dog owner.
Secure carabiner – The Twistlock carabiner locks automatically and prevents the leash from coming off by accident. The carabiner sits on a swivel so that the leash will not spin up.

Two lengths – The 2-meter/78,7 inches Bungee leash provides positive control and is ideal for running and hiking. For biking or skiing, where a safe distance between your dog and the equipment is required, we recommend the 2,8-meter/110,2 inches length.

Directions + READ and follow ALL attached Instructions. + Pay attention to dog while riding to make sure they're by your side and not behind. + RIDE AT DOGS PACE. Keep Ebike power OFF.+Bring water for dog, take breaks for long or hot rides, and check paw pads for over exercise wear. + Not recommended for use with "NO PULL harness" which is uncomfortable & can strain your dog when pulling OR "Towing harness" which can leave the dog next to the front tire. Dog should be beside your bike with a martingale collar or harness that has attchment for the side near the shoulder. +DO NOT mount higher up on bike aginst directions. This will allow for more chance for tipping and be uncomfortable for your dog. PLEASE contact us 1st if you're having trouble. We would love to make sure you and your Dog are riding safely!!!, Recommended for Adults or with Adult Supervision after reading instructions

name: Hands-Free Bicycle Dog Leash for Cycling - 180° Rotating or Fixed Quick-Attach System, Built-in Shock-Absorbing Spring, Anti-Pull Design, Thick Steel Wire Rope 550 lbs (Carbon Fiber)
short_description: ❤【180° Rotation & Fixed Mode】 Exclusive swivel connector allows the leash to rotate freely up to 180°, letting your dog move safely from side to side with plenty of space. Need extra control? Simply lock it in place to keep your dog on one side – perfect for training, safety, or specific riding needs.

❤【Upgraded Heavy-Duty Materials】Equipped with a high-carbon stainless steel quick-release interface for rust and wear resistance; the tube is made of 1.5mm thick industrial-grade aluminum alloy and matched with a belt rope that combines high toughness, durability and weather resistance, further enhancing travel safety .

❤【Built-in Safety Spring】 Integrated shock-absorbing spring reduces sudden pulling force, helps control your dog’s running speed, and prevents dangerous jerks. Keeps both you and your dog safe while cycling.

❤【Quick & Secure Installation】 Anti-slip pad protects your bike and ensures a firm grip without scratches. Use the included hex wrench to install in minutes. Quick-release interface lets you attach or detach the leash with one hand in seconds – no manual tightening required.
❤【Hands-Free Riding】 Keep both hands firmly on the handlebars while your dog runs safely beside you. Enjoy worry-free, stable rides with complete control.

❤【Fits Most Bikes & Harnesses】 Universal design works with most standard bicycles and medium-to-large dogs. Bonus detachable rope allows use as a regular leash for walking, jogging, or hiking – one product for multiple scenarios.

name: Hands-Free Bicycle Dog Leash, Dog Bike Leash Attachment with Quick Connect Mechanism, Ideal for Cycling, Jogging, and Outdoor Activities
short_description: 【Shock-Absorbing Safety System】 Equipped with a built-in spring and elastic buffer, this hands free bicycle dog leash reduces sudden pulls and jerks, keeping your ride smooth and stable. It protects both you and your pet while allowing your dog to run naturally, keeping high-energy dogs safe and active during outdoor exercise.

【Durable Bike Dog Leash Attachment】 This bike dog leash main body is crafted from high-strength alloy steel, featuring a durable elastic cord that withstands up to 110 pounds of pull, ensuring it won’t bend or break under strong pulling force. Built for medium to large dogs, offering reliable performance for daily rides and weekend adventures.

【Quick Installation & Easy Release】 The universal mounting system attaches this dog bike leash attachment to most standard bikes in minutes. No tools are needed, and the quick-release mechanism allows fast detachment for switching bikes, stopping at the park, or easy storage.

【Safe Distance & Flexible Mounting Options】 This dog bike leash keeps your dog at a safe distance from pedals and wheels, preventing tangling and ensuring smooth rides. You can mount it on either the left or right side of your bike, and even use two leashes on both sides for added control. This flexible design gives you peace of mind while enjoying hands-free cycling with your pet.

【Multi-Purpose Use Beyond Cycling】 More than a dog leash for biking, it detaches for walking, jogging, hiking, or training. Seamlessly transition from cycling to everyday activities, keeping your dog exercised and active.

name: Bike Dog Leash Attachment with Shock Absorber, Heavy Duty Hands-Free Bicycle Dog Leash, Adjustable Length, Safety for Outdoor Cycling
short_description: HANDS-FREE BIKE DOG LEASH WITH SAFETY SPRING: Built with a heavy-duty internal spring, this bicycle dog walker leash absorbs sudden jerks and pulls when your dog speeds up, slows down, or changes direction unexpectedly. By reducing impact on both the rider and the pet, it ensures smoother, safer bike rides while preventing accidents caused by sudden tugs.

ADJUSTABLE LENGTH FOR ALL BREEDS: The dog bike leash extends from 26" to 48", allowing you to customize the distance for small, medium, and large dogs. And this dog bike leash/bike dog walker is designed with integrated reflective stitching, providing added visibility and keeping both you and your dog safer during low-light rides.

SAFE & TANGLE-FREE RIDING: The bike dog leash attachment keeps your pup about 14″ away from the wheel with an elevated pivot arm, preventing pedal interference and eliminating the risk of tangled paws for a smoother, safer ride.

EASY INSTALLATION & TRANSFER: Featuring a quick-release clamp with a secure lock system, this bike dog leash attachment is compatible with most seat posts and bike frames for easy, tool-free installation and detachment. Rubber gaskets and grooved contact points ensure a firm grip while protecting your bike from scratches or paint damage.

HANDS-FREE DOG BIKE LEASH FOR SAFE CYCLING: Enjoy safe, hands-free adventures with your pup using this versatile Bike Dog Leash with built-in shock absorber. Designed to let your dog run comfortably by your side, it reduces sudden pull strain for a smoother ride—whether you’re cycling along the lake, cruising forest trails, or enjoying a relaxed bike ride in the park.
